name: littleBits Travis Webhook
description: Travis Webhook that sends output to a littleBits CloudBit

env.CLOUDBIT_ACCESS_TOKEN: Get this from the Settings page of http://control.littlebitscloud.cc
env.CLOUDBIT_DEVICE_ID: Get this from the Settings page of http://control.littlebitscloud.cc
env.HTTP_TRAVIS_REPO_SLUG: The username/reponame of the project on Travis CI
env.HTTP_AUTHENTICATION: Check the README to generate this
